about.title: Our Story & Heritage
about.paragraph1: Dr. Abdul PHS was founded with a passion for bringing the purest Pink Himalayan Salt directly from Pakistan to health-conscious consumers worldwide. Our journey began in the ancient salt mines of the Himalayas, where nature has been crafting the perfect salt for millions of years.
about.paragraph2: What sets us apart is our direct sourcing approach. We maintain close relationships with local mining communities, ensuring fair practices and pristine product quality from mine to your table.
